Question.Subject: Skinit.com customer service phone number?
Question.Content: Does anyone know if Skinit.com has a customer phone number?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If you go to this link:-
https://cart.skinit.com/web_to_case.php
They have an American number there to contact on the right of the page in a block of text.
It is 1(866) 380-8130 and they recommend to call if you need immediate assistance, otherwise you can use the form for a reply in 24-48 business hours.
